name: 4 PM IN THE WAREHOUSE
description:
[CHOOSE A TAPE, IT COULD BE ANY..] [Abandoned tapes from 1989/1977]

After a long time trying to find a decent job, Your last option was getting a warehouse job, Being the unique and the first worker inside in a shift of 4PM, For some reason no one is working besides YOU..

The same story repeats, every random year, Without explanations, They recorded it, With different [FLESHES] variants every time..

 - The Warehouse 2000.

[CREDITS]

NONEXISTENT SYSTEM

>DEVELOPERPAGE<
